faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about creating figures with AI

items.question: What is an AI figure generator?
items.answer: Our AI-powered platform transforms photos, descriptions, or ideas into high-quality digital collectible designs. Using advanced nano-banana AI technology, it creates professional-grade figures in multiple styles including anime, realistic, fantasy, and more. Perfect for collectors, creators, and businesses.

items.question: How does AI figure creation work?
items.answer: Simply upload a photo or enter a description, choose your preferred style (anime, realistic, cyberpunk, etc.), and our AI analyzes the input to generate a unique collectible design. The process takes under 10 seconds and uses machine learning models trained on millions of high-quality actiondesigns.

items.question: What file formats do you support?
items.answer: We accept JPEG, PNG, GIF, and WEBP files up to 20MB for input. Generated designs are delivered as high-resolution PNG files optimized for printing, social media, or digital use. We also provide multiple aspect ratios including square (1:1), portrait (2:3), and landscape (3:2).

items.question: Can I use generated designs commercially?
items.answer: Yes! All collectible designs created with our generator include full commercial usage rights. You can use them for business, resale, marketing, social media, merchandise, and any commercial purposes without additional licensing fees. This applies to all paid plans.

items.question: How long does figure generation take?
items.answer: Most designs are generated in under 10 seconds. Complex requests or high-volume generations may take slightly longer, but our nano-banana AI is optimized for speed. There are no queues or waiting times - you get instant results.

items.question: What creative styles are available?
items.answer: We offer 10+ professional styles including: Anime, Realistic, Fantasy Warrior, Cyberpunk, Ghibli, Superhero, Funko Pop, Oil Painting, Watercolor, and Pixel Art. Each style is carefully optimized for different use cases from collectibles to social media content.

items.question: Do you offer refunds?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid subscriptions. If you're not completely satisfied with the quality of your generated designs, contact our support team for a full refund. Free tier users can test the generator before upgrading.

items.question: How is pricing calculated?
items.answer: Pricing is based on the number of designs you can generate per month: Free (5/day), Creator ($19 for 100/month), Professional ($49 for 500/month), and Enterprise ($199 for unlimited). Each generation uses 1 credit regardless of style or complexity.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can cancel your subscription anytime from your account settings. There are no cancellation fees or long-term commitments. Your unused credits remain available until the end of your billing period.

items.question: What resolution are the outputs?
items.answer: All designs are generated at high resolution (typically 1024x1024 or higher depending on aspect ratio). This ensures they're perfect for printing, social media, commercial use, or any professional application. We maintain consistent quality across all styles.

items.question: Is my data and creations private?
items.answer: Yes, your privacy is our priority. Uploaded images are processed securely and deleted after generation. Generated designs belong to you and are private unless you choose to share them in our community gallery. We never use your content for training or other purposes.

items.question: Can I generate designs for 3D printing?
items.answer: Yes! Our collectible designs are optimized for various uses including 3D printing. While we generate 2D images, they're designed with proper geometry and printable details in mind. We provide guides for converting to 3D formats and optimizing for different printers.
